ProjectTitle: Extramural English and young learners' development of implicit and explicit second language knowledge.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
17/12/2024
Storage/Preservation: please note that KU Leuven OneDrive for Business is an online - in the Microsoft cloud - solution and therefore outside the protected KU Leuven network /university's central servers. Please ensure that you store your data as approved in your PRET application. Consult the storage guide for more information: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: only share your data openly on OSF if you are sure that it is fully anonymous, if there is still a (small) possibility that the participants could be reidentified please use RDR and apply access restrictions so interested researchers will have to submit a request to access the files. You can use the integration dashboard to upload your OSF data to RDR see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
label: good with suggestions
